Patrick Altmeyer {#title}

### Researching Trustworthy Artificial Intelligence (AI) for Finance and Economics

I am an economist by background with an interest in cross-disciplinary research on the intersection of Trustworthy AI and Financial Economics. For my PhD in Trustworthy AI, I currently focus on Counterfactual Explanations and Probabilisitic Machine Learning under supervision of [Cynthia Liem](https://www.cynthialiem.com) at [Delft University of Technology](https://tudelft.nl/).
